import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Grid, Cell} from 'react-mdl'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class about extends Component{ render(){ return(
Do you know what Collatz Conjecture is? It is a beautiful litlle thing.

Anyway, I'm Abhineet, currently in the pre-final year of my B.Tech. in Computer Science at IIT Ropar. I take in interest in Deep Learning and Software Development.

Education

Degree

Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science from IIT Ropar

Languages

C/C++, Python, JavaScript, Dart

Skills

Keras, Tensorflow, Android, PyTorch

Bored already? Checkout the books I've read.

) } } export default about;
